mainText: I send my condolences to his family. Stay strong, stay focused and remember him as a innovator that changed how we use computers! I remembered when the iPod came to the market . It changed the world, music , everything. It was a ground breaker! The Apple family and Steve continued to change how to we use computers, even until his last day!  He'll always be remembered! R.I.P MR APPLE     (Steve Jobs)
author: Alex
